title: saamaja varadhA
sahitya:
sAmaja varadA nIku sari evvarayya rAmA

anupallavi

 kAma janaka shubha phaladA karuNAlavAla

caraNam

 paramAnanda karuDani nIdu bhaktitOnu koliciyuNTe parama pavtrulaku nIdu 
paramArthamu losagu vara shESAcalEndudau shrInivAsuDani ceppaTTina

madhyamakAlam

sArasadaLa nayanuni apAra mahimalanu telisina nArada muni vinuta pArthasArathini pogaDigagala
